Params: {3: 'Another black data steam bursts out of Ann.'}
{3: 'The two data streams converge to form a giant black figure.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Researcher', 3: 'We\'re adding a backup of "her" personality data to "Virtual Horizon?"', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Officer', 3: 'Well, after all, the most important point of "Virtual Horizon" is to learn how to control that monster in order to win wars.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Researcher', 3: "I see. Looks like ARU's wish to rule the world isn't staying a mere dream.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Officer', 3: 'Of course. The world will be in the palm of our hand...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ann', 3: "I see... I was born from a monster. I'm... also a monster...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Dark Monster waves its huge claws at the unsuspecting Ann.'}
{3: 'But the claws are blocked by a red blade, sending sparks into the air.'}
{3: 'Not only was it just the Lotus frame, but rather, all the Constructs in "Virtual Horizon" are appearing before you. They join forces to resist the monster\'s attack.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ann', 3: "What's going on? They weren't summoned, nor were they ordered here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ann recalls that she had, in fact, inadvertently added simple personality modules to the Constructs.'}
{3: 'In a sense, Ann is their creator.'}
{3: 'Although the Constructs remain robotic as ever, they closely guard Ann.'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'I see... Thank you, everyone... Now, just one last mission remains!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'And that is to get you safely out of here!', 4: '1'}
